title: Open-source ISO Toolkit
description: ISO or ISPO (Initial Stake Pool Offering) is one of the best ways to raise funds, but there aren't any tools to do it efficiently yet.
solution: Develop and open-source tools to help projects do their own ISO and help them save time to focus on developing their applications.
experience: MInswap's Fair ISO is considered one of the best-executed ISO in Cardano community. We have experience with DB Sync and Cardano toolings.
